summary: Implemented TikTok/Reels-style vertical recap feed UI with new `VideoFeed`, `VideoPlayer`, and `VideoControls` components, integrated into `src/app/page.tsx` while preserving the existing meeting list in a collapsible section. Added TDD coverage in `tests/tiktok-style-video-feed-ui.test.mjs` (RED->GREEN) for required files, snap feed behavior, auto play/pause logic, controls scope, and homepage wiring. Appended Task 08 learnings/decisions/issues notepad entries. Verification completed with `npm test && npm run build && npx tsc --noEmit` (33/33 tests passing, Next.js build successful, typecheck clean).
